build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3 python3-pip && python3 -m pip install --upgrade pip && pip3 install -r requirements.txt

deploy.startCommand: python -m streamlit run app/Home.py --server.address 0.0.0.0 --server.port $PORT --server.fileWatcherType none --browser.gatherUsageStats false --client.toolbarMode minimal
